name: Bald Dad tries not to die
name_original: Bald Dad tries not to die
description:
Made in 72 hours for LudumDare 50

It is a simple top down infinite shooter, in which you have to delay the inevitable: your death.

Shoot horrendous brains and punch them with your gun if you want.

CONTROLS:

W A S D : Move

Point and Left click: aim and shoot

Space: Melee attack ( gives you more ammo, but it is risky ;) )

Escape: Pause game
